original_text: So the man who marries his young woman is doing a good thing. But the man who does not marry is doing a better thing.
korean_text: 그러므로 결혼하는 자도 잘하거니와 결혼하지 아니하는 자는 더 잘하는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: So the man who marries his young woman
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 자기 젊은 여자와 결혼하는 남자는

sentences.original_text: But the man who does not marry
